If you’re a fan of true crime, mystery, and suspense, you’ll love my novel and my page.

Deep in the heart of the woods, there once lived a tree that spent its years gathering stories from every creature of the forest. Over time it learned to craft a human body for itself, so that it may travel to distant lands to find tales it had never known. Some say it still lives in a secret grove, waiting to be discovered, and eager to share its collection with all who come to visit.

Its me. I'm the tree. Nice to meet you :)

#pngtuber #vtuber #livestream #twitch #stories #writing #poetry

Good Afternoon everyone,

DEPHER stood for!
"Disabled and Elderly Plumbing and Heating Emergency Repair" - as we are now branching the company to more of a open plumbing service that helps more than the disabled and elderly we thought this was much needed as we received phonecalls and emails asking do we help this person or can we help this other person we want the company to stand for everybody that needs us, hence the new name

" Community Plumbing &Heating "

fields.name: To give independence to those in their own homes
